name: 真乃
text: ……はぁ、はぁ……どう、かな？
trans: ...Hah, hah... How, was it?

name: めぐる
text:
──うん！　今の、すっごく良かった！
真乃、ちゃんと掴めてきてるよっ
trans:
─Awesome! That was really great!
Mano, you've really got it!

name: 真乃
text:
ほわっ、め、めぐるちゃんっ
私、汗かいてるから、くっつかない方が……
trans:
Howa, M-Meguru-chan...
I'm, kind of sweaty, so if you stick close you'll...

name: めぐる
text:
えへへー！　そんなの気にならないよ！
──特訓の成果、出てきてるね！
trans:
Ehehe! I'm not bothered at all!
─Our special training really paid off!

name: 真乃
text: めぐるちゃんのおかげだよっ
trans: It's all thanks to you, Meguru-chan.

name: めぐる
text:
よーし、じゃあ今日はもうちょっと頑張っちゃおうか！
……でもその前に、一旦休憩にしよう！
trans:
Alright, then let's keep at it today...!
But before that, it's time for a short break!

name: 真乃
text: あ、じゃあ、何か飲み物買ってくるね
trans: Ah, then I'll go buy us some drinks.

name: めぐる
text: えっ、いいよ！　そんな気を遣わなくても──
trans:
Hey, it's alright! You don't have to go out of
your way─

name: 真乃
text:
お礼、させてほしいんだっ
待ってて、めぐるちゃん
trans:
I want to show you my thanks!
Just wait here, Meguru-chan.

name: 灯織
text: （……あれって……）
trans: (...Isn't that...)

name: 灯織
text: 櫻木さん……？
trans: Sakuragi-san...?

name: 真乃
text:
ひ、灯織ちゃんっ？
どうしたの？　今日、お休みだったんじゃ──
trans:
H-Hiori-chan? What are you doing here?
Wasn't today your day off─

name: 灯織
text:
プロデューサーから、
臨時レッスンだって聞いてて……
trans:
Producer told me that there would be an extra
lesson today...

name: 真乃
text:
ほわっ？　臨時レッスン？　私、なんにも聞いてなくて……
……あれっ。でも今日は私ずっとここを使う予定で──
trans:
Howa? An extra lesson? I didn't hear anything about
it... Huh? But I've booked the studio for all of today─

name: 灯織
text: えっと……櫻木さん、大丈夫？
trans: Umm... Sakuragi-san, is everything alright?

name: 灯織
text:
……慌てなくていいよ
……えっと……どこか行くところだった？
trans:
...There's no need to panic.
...Umm... Were you headed somewhere?

name: 真乃
text: あの、ね……飲み物を買いに……
trans: Uh, I was... going to buy some drinks...

name: 真乃
text:
……ひ、灯織ちゃん！
ちょっとだけ、付き合ってもらってもいい……？
trans:
...H-Hiori-chan!
Would you please come with me, for a little while...?

name: 真乃
text:
今日はね、プロデューサーさんにお願いして、
レッスン場を使わせてもらってたんだ
trans:
Actually, I asked Producer-san to let me use the
lesson studio for today...

name: 真乃
text:
私、できないことが多いから……
たくさん練習しなきゃって思って
trans:
There are a lot of parts I couldn't do well...
so I thought I needed more practice.

name: 灯織
text: そう……なんだ
trans: I... see.

name: 真乃
text:
さっき、やっと上手くできたんだよっ
めぐるちゃんも、褒めてくれたんだ
trans:
Just now, I think I finally did it right!
Meguru-chan even praised me for it.

name: 真乃
text:
早く、ふたりと同じ場所に立ちたいって思ってたから……
ちょっとだけ近づけた気がして、すごく嬉しいの
trans:
I want to stand equal to the two of you as soon as
I can... I'm really glad that I could come a little
closer today.

name: 真乃
text:
ふたりに並べるように……いつか、ふたりと一緒に
歩けるように、私、これからも頑張るねっ
trans:
I'll keep doing by best from now on... So that I can
match up to, and walk together with you two
someday!

name: 灯織
text: 待って！
trans: Wait!

name: 灯織
text:
……櫻木さんが、並べてないなんてこと、ない
私たちは、ちゃんと同じ場所に立ってるよ
trans:
...Sakuragi-san, there's no way you're not equal to
us. We're all starting from the same place.

name: 灯織
text: 櫻木さんだけ追いついてないみたいに……言わないで
trans:
So please... don't say something like you're the only
one behind...

name: 真乃
text: で、でも……
trans: B-But...

name: 灯織
text: 櫻木さん……本当に、ごめんなさい
trans: Sakuragi-san... I'm truly sorry.

name: 真乃
text: え。えっ？
trans: Eh, eh?

name: 灯織
text:
謝らなくちゃいけないことがたくさんある
……レッスンの時のこと
trans:
There's so much that I need to apologize for...
Like what I said during our lesson.

name: 灯織
text: 私、いつもきつく言っちゃって……
trans: I always say things in the harshest way...

name: 真乃
text:
そ、そんなっ、灯織ちゃんはアドバイスしてくれただけで、
謝ることじゃないよっ
trans:
T-That's not true, you're just giving me advice.
It's nothing to apologize for...

name: 灯織
text: ううん。私、全然言い方を考えられてなかった
trans: No, it is. I didn't think about how it would sound at all.

name: 灯織
text:
……それに、櫻木さんのことも誤解してた
八宮さんのことも
trans:
...And, I completely misunderstood you, Sakuragi-san.
Hachimiya-san, too.

name: 灯織
text:
……あんなふうにきつく言ってばかりだったから、
私と練習するの、嫌になっちゃうんじゃないかって
trans:
...I thought that because I kept saying such harsh
things, you would get sick of practicing with me.

name: 灯織
text:
……ふたりのこと、全然わかってなかった
もしかしたら諦めちゃうかもって、勝手に心配して……
trans:
...I didn't understand you two at all.
I worried myself sick imagining that you might quit...

name: 灯織
text:
ふたりの、アイドルになりたいっていう気持ち、
信じられてなかった
trans:
I completely underestimated you two and your
determination towards being idols.

name: 灯織
text: ……本当に、ごめんなさい
trans: ...I'm really, truly sorry.

name: 真乃
text:
そ、そんなこと！　そんなこと全然気にしてないよっ
灯織ちゃんの気持ちに追いつけてなかったのは本当だし……
trans:
N-No, stop it! It's not a big deal to me at all.
It's true that my feelings towards being an idol don't
compare to yours, Hiori-chan...

name: 真乃
text:
私、落ち込んじゃうばっかりで、
灯織ちゃんと全然お話できてなかった
trans:
I always get myself down, and I couldn't even bring
myself to talk to you.

name: 真乃
text:
こういうことっ、ほんとは話しておかなきゃなのに、
上手くできなくて……！
trans:
This is something we should really talk out,
yet I couldn't even do that properly...!

name: 真乃
text:
あの、えっと、とにかく、
私、灯織ちゃんと練習するの、嫌なんかじゃないよっ
trans:
Ah, umm, anyway, I'd never come to hate practicing
with you, Hiori-chan.

name: 灯織
text: …………ありがとう、櫻木さん
trans: ...Thank you, Sakuragi-san.

name: 真乃
text:
……うんっ。ごめんね、灯織ちゃん
ありがとう
trans:
...Yeah. I'm sorry, Hiori-chan.
Thank you.

name: 灯織
text:
私、これからもっと……もっと頑張る
ふたりに、恥ずかしくないように
trans:
I'm going to keep working hard from now on...
So that you two won't be ashamed of me.

name: 灯織
text: ……ふたりに、負けないように
trans: ...So that I don't lose to you two.

name: 真乃
text: ──うんっ、私も負けないよ
trans: ─Yeah. I won't lose either.

name: 真乃
text:
……ね、灯織ちゃん。この後、一緒に練習できないかな？
特訓の成果、見てもらいたいんだ
trans:
...Hey, Hiori-chan. Will you come and practice with
us after this? I want to show you the results of
my training.

name: 灯織
text: ……うん
trans: ...Sure.

name: めぐる
text: も～っ！　真乃、おっそーい！
trans: Aww, Mano, you took so looong!

name: めぐる
text:
……って、あれ？　灯織？
なんでー！？
trans:
...Uh, hey? Hiori?
Why are you here!?

name: 真乃
text: ええっと……臨時レッスン、かな？
trans: ...Umm, for extra lessons, I guess?

name: 灯織
text:
今から、私も一緒にやらせてほしい
さ！　休憩は終わり。レッスン、始めよう？
trans:
I'd like to join you two from now.
Come on, break time's over! Let's start the lesson.
